description:
This Date Parser no-code plugin operates on a simple principle: provide it with a relative date in text format (e.g., "One week ago"), and it will deliver the actual date to you.

name: Date Parser
plugin_instructions: Use the action "Convert Relative Time To Date". Pass in any  text like "One week ago", "Two days from now", etc. and the action will return a date to you.
